nodes.text: European leftists, who want to rule Poland
Corrupted liberals
Greedy, manipulative Jews, who betrayed Polish trust after being saved from Holocaust
Can’t be recognised anymore because they changed their surnames to Polish, often ginger, big-nosed, non-Slavic looking
‘Antisemitism’ inventors, secretly propagating ‘antipolonism’
Ecologists who invented the climate change propaganda to destroy Polish (coal) industry
Anaemic vegetarians, bribed by the Western companies to destroy Polish meat industry, weak and stubborn, demasculinised by GMO soya products
Aggressive bicycle users terrorising people to abandon their cars, they cannot afford a car and live with their parents
Artists trying to eradicate any difference, gender and tradition
Fat, short-haired feminists transforming Polish women into aggressive hermaphrodites
Polish women, foolish and soft, easily seduced by the immigrants or manipulated by the ‘mothers with children’ narrative produced by the West
Crypto-communists (children of the communist oppressors, made their fortunes during communism appropriating other people’s fortunes)
Immoral atheists plotting to destroy Polish Catholic Church and Christian values
Pope Francis: Western figurehead bribed by the Jews
Animal rights defenders destroying traditional Polish cuisine and preventing economical progress, fanatics
Fireworks opposers, blinded by the Western PC rhetoric, preventing people from having fun
Dog owners terrorising the cities with their aggressive, untidy dogs
Germans: fascist invaders who made their fortunes on Holocaust, sneaky predators and simultaneously demasculinised leftists
Putin, secretly responsible for the crisis in Europe, wishing to invade Polish territory
Russian solders intending to rape Polish women
Job stealing Ukrainians, wild, uncultured and primitive
Lgbtq: “gender ideology”, “unnatural” deviants, ridden with AIDS, homosexual = pedophiles, responsible for pedophilia in the Catholic Church
The rich, post-communist, inherited their money from their fathers: communist traitors
The intellectuals: academics, communists, parasites
Philosophy students: lazy millennials detached from reality
Lazy teachers enjoying seasonal holiday, stealing the government money and abusing Polish children
Pro-choice activists killing Polish children, causing low fertility rate
Immigrants: “Islamists”, dirty terrorist, who run away from their countries instead of defending them
Usually dark and handsome, seducing Polish women (spoiling Polish blood)
PO centrist party: secret Jews, corrupted, thieves, either neoliberal or crypto-communist
Communist, collaborated with the Russians on the assassination of Lech Kaczyński: former president and other right wing politicians
Sex educators working for the pharmaceutical companies, selling contraception to the prepubescent girls
Scandinavian ‘losers’ terrorised in their own countries by the immigrants and their own children brought up without discipline and values
TVN (Polish TV station) funded and manipulated by the West
Millennials, spoilt cowards addicted to their phones, manipulated by the West
Hipsters, demasculinised impotents, homosexuals in skinny jeans
Political Correctness as a disease silencing people’s right to free speech
Young women, Westernised and impure, with dyed hair, spoilt by the Western influence
Unfaithful, not-virgins anymore, sexually liberated and having sex with the rich foreigners (of colour)
